column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The atmosphere is really swanky
column2: it's also quite dark so we're glad we weren't at a booth because we might fall asleep. We started with a seafood tower (it's bigger than you think!) full of oysters
column5: and shrimp. Then we split the 22oz bone in dry rub ribeye which was absolutely delicious! We loved the seasoning and the sear. It was fantastic.
